proposed_strategy.name: Single Prapāṭhaka Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The entire Third Prapāṭhaka is processed in one chunk as the estimated length is safely below the hard character limit.

execution_plan.description: Complete Third Prapāṭhaka (Khandas 1 through 19), including all Mūla text and commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Khanda (section) serves as the fundamental logical unit, grouping the Mūla verses and their associated commentary (Bhāṣya/Prakāśikā).

start_pattern.description: Starts with a bolded heading naming the Khaṇḍa (e.g., प्रथमः).

end_pattern.description: Ends with the definitive conclusion of the commentary for that specific Khaṇḍa.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: Treat the initial 'छान्दोग्योपनिषत्' and 'तृतीयः प्रपाठकः' headings as document context before the first parsable unit (Khaṇḍa 1).
